reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My steps will be:
1. First, view the repository structure
2. Look at the pom.xml file to see the current configuration
3. Update the Java version in pom.xml to 17
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to test the build
6. Fix any issues that arise
